title: Podcast Production Workshop for Medical Information Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and general medical terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners experience podcast production simulations in VR environments, create/share content via personal devices; an educational setting combining medical information acquisition and digital literacy enhancement

learning_goals: Learners can plan and produce one medical information-based podcast
Learners can explain content distribution methods using RSS feeds
Learners can improve podcast content at least once by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
